name: UpdateTransferOrder
description:
Update specific fields of a transfer order.

Use this tool to modify particular fields of an existing transfer order without affecting others. This will trigger a transfer_order.updated webhook event.

parameters.name: transfer_order_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the transfer order to be updated.

value_schema.description: The ID of the transfer order to update

parameters.name: transfer_order_update_data
parameters.description: JSON object with fields to update the transfer order, including idempotency key, transfer details, and version.

idempotency_key.description: A unique string that identifies this UpdateTransferOrder request. Keys must contain only alphanumeric characters, dashes and underscores

source_location_id.description:
The source [Location](entity:Location) that will send the items. Must be an active location
in your Square account with sufficient inventory of the requested items.

destination_location_id.description:
The destination [Location](entity:Location) that will receive the items. Must be an active location
in your Square account.

expected_at.description: Expected transfer date in RFC 3339 format (e.g. "2023-10-01T12:00:00Z").

uid.description: Line item id being updated. Required for updating/removing existing line items, but should not be set for new line items.

item_variation_id.description:
Catalog item variation being transferred

Required for new line items, but otherwise is not updatable.

remove.description: Flag to remove the line item during update. Must include `uid` in removal request

transfer_order.description: Data model for updating a transfer order. All fields are optional.

value_schema.description:
An object containing the fields to POST for the request.

See the corresponding object definition for field details.
